name: Bank Guarantee Report
query:
select
    `tabBank Guarantee`.name as "Name:Link/Bank Guarantee:150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.bank_guarantee_purpose as "Bank Guarantee Purpose::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.bg_type as "Bank Guarantee Type::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.customer as "Customer Type::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.project as "Project Type::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.customer_address as "Customer Address Type::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.amount as "Amount Type::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.start_date as "Start Date Type::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.validity as "Validity in Days Type::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.end_date as "End Date::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.type_of_letter_of_guarantee as "Bank Guarantee Status::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.bg_condition as "Bank Guarantee Condition ::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.bank as "Bank::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.bank_account as "Bank Account::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.account as "Account::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.bank_account_no as "Bank Account No::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.bg_commission as "Bank Guarantee Commission (EGP)::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.co as "Initial Bank Guarantee Issuing Commission::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.rate as "Reservation Rate For Initial BG ::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.co2 as "Advanced Payment Bank Guarantee Issuing Commission::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.rate1 as "Reservation Rate For Advanced Payment BG::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.co3 as "Final Bank Guarantee Issuing Commission::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.rate2 as "Reservation Rate For Final BG ::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.dpaccount as "Insurance Account::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.dpaccountc as "Fees Account::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.banking_facilities as "Banking Facilities::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.account_for_bank_facilities as "Bank Facilities Account::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.account_1 as "Account::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.bank_guarantee_number as "Bank Guarantee Number::150",
    `tabBank Guarantee`.name_of_beneficiary as "Name of Beneficiary::150"





from
    `tabBank Guarantee`
where
    `tabBank Guarantee`.docstatus != 2
    and  `tabBank Guarantee`.start_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
